p: Especially those criteria associated with dealing with an uncertain future could be found in very few plans (5% and less) and with very low intensity (depth 0.5, on a 0.5â€“1 scale). Furthermore, the extension of strategy design to include future changes of conservation targets (4. 2), scenario planning (8. 3) and identifying and prioritizing robust or non-regret strategies (8. 4.) could only be found in five plans (8%). Institutional capacity building with regard to climate change research and management methodologies (9. 3, 9. 4) was not treated at all in any of the analyzed plans.
